mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_IDX , PRODUCT_IDX , CONTENT , REGISTER, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM PRODUCT_REPLY WHERE PRODUCT_IDX = #{productIdx} ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REPLY ( PRODUCT_IDX, CONTENT, REGISTER, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{productIdx}, #{content}, #{register}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_REPLY SET CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATE_DT = now() WHERE REPLY_IDX = #{replyIdx}
